abstract.p: The ordering of endohedral clusterfullerenes Sc 3N@C 80 and YSc 2N@C 80 co-crystallized with Ni(OEP) and isolated complexes with Ni(OEP) have been investigated theoretically. Having used multiple orientations of M 3N clusters inside the cages with Fibonacci sampling, we describe the effect of intermolecular interactions on the orientation of the endohedral cluster.
